participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined, creative, and passionate about both medicine and the arts.
participant_1.background: Both of my parents are doctors. I do community theater when I am not in school. I am in medical school. I really wanted to be an actor.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing, adventurous, and enjoys living in the moment.
participant_2.background: I enjoy playing video games. I live life to its fullest. I enjoy listening to country music. I have a crummy job at scrubway. I am in college.

content.text: It's nice to meet you! What are you up to today?
I'm just playing some video games. What about you?
I'm just doing some research for my medical school classes.
Oh, that sounds interesting. What are you studying?
I'm studying to be a doctor.
That's amazing! I've always wanted to be a doctor, but I don't think I could handle the schooling.
It's definitely a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding.
I'm sure it is. I'm kind of glad I'm not going to med school, though. I like my job at Scrubway.
What do you do at Scrubway?
I'm a cashier. It's not the most glamorous job, but it pays the bills and I get to meet a lot of interesting people.
That's great! I'm glad you're happy with your job.
Thanks! I am. What do you do for fun?
I do community theater when I'm not in school. I really wanted to be an actor, but I realized I wasn't good enough.
That's too bad. But it's great that you're still involved in the theater community.
Yeah, I love it. It's a lot of fun and I get to meet some really great people.
That's great! I'm glad you're happy.
